lead_paragraph: MICHAEL--Carola, (1921-2016), born Hamburg, Germany. Loving and adored wife of the late Walter. Beloved and proud mother of the late Michael (Carol), Suzanne, and Karen (Bill); Oma to Joshua, Rachel (Mike) and Lindsey (Ryan); Goma to Evie Weaver, president Queens Museum; volunteer, Neuberger Museum. Her intelligence and optimism will be missed, as will her devotion to family and friends. Family thanks her wonderful caregivers Rashidah, Audrey, Maritza and Padma. A celebration of her life to be held this spring. In her memory, please donate to Save the Children Foundation. 1/3
